#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

int main(void)
{
	int T;
	long long a, b, x, i, j, foo;

	scanf("%d", &T);

	while (T--)
	{
		scanf("%lld %lld", &a, &b);
		
		x=a-b;
		b=min(x, b);
		foo=1;
		i=1; j=a-b+1;
		
		while(i<=b)
		{
			foo=(foo*j)/i;
			
			i++;
			j++;
		}
		
		printf("%lld\n",foo);
	}

	return 0;
}
